phrs.translation: 锡达拉皮兹市（美国城市）

sentences.sentence: He checked into Cedars Sinai Hospital to dry out.
sentences.translation: 他住进了雪松西奈医院去戒酒。

sentences.sentence: Said Black of Cedars-Sinai Medical Center.
sentences.translation: Cedars - Sinai医学中心的布莱克说。

sentences.sentence: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars
sentences.translation: 大山和小山，结果的树木，和一切香柏树
